tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: is it totally wrong that I find Capt. Jack Sparrow like.. really﻿ attractive ..? lololol
This is the best live action disney movie ever.﻿
i prefer rum..rum s good-Captain Jack﻿ Sparrow
they are both﻿ so hot omg i cant why
This is definitely the﻿ best movie ever .
that awkward moment﻿ when you find out kiera was 17 when this was filmed...and was semi-romancing johnny...who was 40. hmm..
the ride in﻿ disneyland/disneyworld is the inspiration

its easy to misconstrued based on﻿ that fact that her tits stopped growing after 10 on how old she really is..understandable...but i just cant get pedo-jack outta ma mind...he's rivalling Michael Douglas and Hugh Hefner
Is﻿ it weird that I've never watched a single one of these movies? All I know is that I do wanna watch this now :3

No man who's almost 50 can ever﻿ be as attractive as Johnny Depp.
I feel weird saying that...
well it was keira's idea in the first place...bcuz she's the﻿ one that suggested it to the director..about kissing jack sparrow..buuuut you gotta admit Captain Jack Sparrow is a VERY sexy man:D
fav﻿ movie!
pause at 1:45 you see balotelli﻿
This one was perfect. The atmosphere, the story, the﻿ pace, everything. They didn't need to make anymore after this...
1:44 balotelli :D ﻿
Whenever there is a series of movies i﻿ always love the first one best, its the excitement that things have just begun
wow...﻿
Anyone know where i can﻿ find this Version of the Music?

Unfortunately,it did.I've got some friends with really idiotic taste in movies,trust me. Of course,it was a joke and wasn't﻿ taken seriously but it did start a pillow fight and a heated discussion about movie preferences :P
Add the Pirates of the Carribean theme song for special effect for this vid!﻿ Awesome
26 people need to get﻿ bitch slapped by that monkey
whaaaaaaaaaaaat she was 17??!!! i never﻿ knew!!! thought she'd be at least 20-23....

Reviewer.Music: i really love listening to older songs from 2000 to 2010. for some reason they all bring back memories.

Reviewer.Books: My Sister's Keeper, The Hunger Games Triology, United We Stand, Tuck Everlasting, Emily of New Moon, Blood & Iron, Beastly, Radiance, Shaken, Harry Potter 1-7, Kissed By An Angel, Dark Secrets 2, Alphas, Movers & Fakers, Belle of the Brawl, Twilight, New Moon, Eclipse, Breaking Dawn, The American Girls Series, Bridge to Teribithia
Reviewer.Movies: Tangled, Avatar, Shrek Forever After, Soul Surfer, Red Riding Hood, Twilight, Titanic, Beauty and the Beast, Karate Kid (2010), Yours Mines & Ours, School of Rock
Reviewer.Music: P!nk, The Script, 30 Seconds to Mars, Sarah McLachlan, Beyonce, Michael Jackson, OneRepublic, Taylor Swift, Jackie Evancho, Lady Gaga, Demi Lovato, Daughtry, Regina Spektor, He is We, Nickelback, Bruno Mars, Carrie Underwood, Evanescence, Christina Perri, Sara Bareilles, Various YouTube Artists

Reviewer.Movies: Uhhh kind of addicted to anime..... :D

Reviewer.Music: Tupac, Biggie Smalls, Eminem, Nino, Priester
i really love listening to older songs from 2000 to 2010. for some reason they all bring back memories.

Reviewer.Books: Harry Potter,Game of Thrones,The Inheritance Cycle,Inkheart,Young Samurai,CHERUB,The Chronicles of Narnia,His Dark Matherials,The Dark is Rising,Secret Series,We Children from Bahnhof Zoo,White Fang...
Reviewer.Movies: Harry Potter,LoTR,PoTC(and so on,mostly Sci-Fi,Fantasy and Comedy)
Reviewer.Music: I have a quite random taste really.....Mostly Linkin Park,Avril Lavigne and Wrock(Wizard Rock/Harry Potter music xD)

Reviewer.Movies: Uhhh kind of addicted to anime..... :D
